Articles.Content:
Hello kerbals! I wanted to bring back something that goes like this. On the loading screen, we see "Locating Jebediah Kerman", and I thought, why not make a game! The rules are:

1.You locate your jebediah kerman and post it to this thread,

2. You add something hilarious E.X. My jebidiah is on a space station, Adding missiles with BOOSTERS!

I will go first: My jebidiah is at the astronaut complex, using the centrifuge device to go to "Space"

My jebediah is currently orbiting Kerbol trying to figure out how to get back to Kerbin without much fuel left. Due to a lack of foresight when designing his ship, he is currently practicing running the life support systems for 1 hour on, 1 hour off to conserve battery life.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53811-Where-is-YOUR-Jebediah-Kerman

Failing to see why we need 2 threads about the same thing, on the same page, the old one being already active, just for the 'hilarious part'.

My jeb is at the VAB After his probe rocket returned from my Jool space station. He's waiting for a new flight.

Luckily my other Kerbals are waiting for him. Especially the ones with BadS too

duhh,there is already a thread about that,

but this attempt is horrible,it's JebEdiah,not jebi ;3
